content.question: George Washingtonâ€™s suggestions about United States foreign relations reflect which of the following situations?

choices.label: The need to establish industries to export more goods
The desire to encourage immigration from northern and western Europe
The continued European colonial presence along United States borders
The challenge of spreading American revolutionary ideals abroad

content.answer: The continued European colonial presence along United States borders

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
